振り出す: (ふりだす) - to shake out; to draw a check (bill, draft, etc.)/to issue (e.g. money order); to infuse (e.g. in hot water)
振り分ける: (ふりわける) - to divide in two/to divide in half; to apportion/to divide among/to portion out/to allot/to assign
振り分け荷物: (ふりわけにもつ) - pair of bundles slung over a shoulder
振り分け髪: (ふりわけがみ) - hair parted in the middle
振り切る: (ふりきる) - to shake off/to shake free from; to swing completely
振り合い: (ふりあい) - consideration; comparison; usage; custom
振り合う: (ふりあう) - to touch each other
振り向く: (ふりむく) - to turn one's face; to turn around; to look over one's shoulder
振り向ける: (ふりむける) - to turn (around); to appropriate/to set aside for a purpose
振り回す: (ふりまわす) - to wield/to brandish/to flourish/to wave (about)/to swing; to display (one's knowledge)/to show off; to abuse (one's power); to manipulate someone
振り幅: (ふりはば) - amplitude (of vibration); swing of pendulum
振り当てる: (ふりあてる) - to assign; to allot
振り捨てる: (ふりすてる) - to shake off; to forsake
振り掛け: (ふりかけ) - dried food sprinkled over rice; fish flour
振り掛ける: (ふりかける) - to sprinkle over (e.g. salt, pepper, etc. on food)
振り撒く: (ふりまく) - to scatter; to sprinkle; to lavish
振り放す: (ふりはなす) - to break free of
振り方: (ふりかた) - manner of swinging/way of swinging; way of dealing with something
振り替える: (ふりかえる) - to change (e.g. a bill); to transfer (e.g. money); to switch over; to move over
振り替え休日: (ふりかえきゅうじつ) - (yoji) compensatory holiday; observed holiday (weekday holiday when the actual day is on a weekend); substitute holiday
振り混ぜる: (ふりまぜる) - to shake up; to shake (in order to mix, shuffle, etc.)
振り漢字: (ふりかんじ) - kanji printed as ruby, usually to explain kana
振り立てる: (ふりたてる) - to toss (i.e. one's head); to wave (i.e. a flag); to stand up energetically; to raise one's voice
振り絞る: (ふりしぼる) - to muster (one's strength); to strain (e.g. one's voice)
振り翳ざす: (ふりかざす) - to raise (esp. overhead)/to brandish (e.g. sword)/to flourish; to wield (e.g. power, authority)/to proclaim one's principles
振り翳す: (ふりかざす) - to raise (esp. overhead)/to brandish (e.g. sword)/to flourish; to wield (e.g. power, authority)/to proclaim one's principles
振り落す: (ふりおとす) - to shake off; to throw off
振り落とす: (ふりおとす) - to shake off; to throw off
振り被る: (ふりかぶる) - to hold aloft (e.g. a sword); to brandish
振り解く: (ふりほどく) - to shake and untangle
振り起こす: (ふりおこす) - to stir up; to stimulate
振り起す: (ふりおこす) - to stir up; to stimulate
振り込み: (ふりこみ) - payment made via bank deposit transfer; {mahj}  discarding a tile that becomes another player's winning tile
振り込む: (ふりこむ) - to make a payment via bank deposit transfer; {mahj} to discard another player's winning tile
振り込め詐欺: (ふりこめさぎ) - remittance fraud; bank transfer scam
振り返す: (ふりかえす) - to relapse; to reassert; to review
振り返る: (furikaeru) - virar a cabeça, olhar por cima do ombro, se virar, olhar para trás; pensar no passado, relembrar, olhar para trás, refletir
振り逃げ: (ふりにげ) - reaching first base safely due to opponent's error
振り離す: (ふりはなす) - to break free of
振る: (ぶる) - assuming the air of .../behaving like ...; to put on airs/to be self-important
振るい落す: (ふるいおとす) - to shake off
振るい落とす: (ふるいおとす) - to shake off
振るう: (ふるう) - to swing/to wield (physically)/to exert; to exercise (e.g. power, ability)/to exhibit/to display/to wield (metaphorically); to flourish/to prosper/to thrive
振るった: (ふるった) - different; eccentric; original; striking; extraordinary
振るわない: (ふるわない) - in a bad way; dull
振る舞う: (ふるまう) - to behave/to conduct oneself; to entertain/to treat someone (to a drink)/to make tea for someone (tea ceremony)

振れ幅: (ふれはば) - amplitude; degree of vibration; range of vibration; degree of instability
